Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by West Texas in 1976...
Had first career hit on 8/18/1978, off Theodore Guss (LP)...
Hit first career homerun on 10/2/1978, off Carmine Rosa (PEN)...
Injured on 4/6/1981 with a Fractured Hand, out for 6 weeks...
Had 20-game hitting streak snapped on 5/28/1982...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Injured on 6/6/1983 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for full season...
